articles.title: AL beats NL for ninth straight time, Stanton claims MVP at 2022 MLB All-Star Game - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Giancarlo Stanton homered in his Dodger Stadium homecoming, Byron Buxton followed with another drive and the American League won its ninth straight All-Star Game, beating the National League 3-2 on Tuesday night.
